testcase.name: Connect to "/" using browser
Connect to "/" using browser to view menu
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Connect to "/" using browser to view menu When I go to "/" ... passed in 0.365s Then I should see a page with title "Home" ... passed in 0.011s When I press the "menu" ... passed in 0.076s Then There should be a "SIGN UP" link ... passed in 0.174s Then There should be a "LOG IN" link ... passed in 0.183s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
